00609 #define EXP_OP_STATIC     0x00  
00610 #define EXP_OP_SIG        0x01  
00611 #define EXP_OP_XOR        0x02  
00612 #define EXP_OP_MULTIPLY   0x03  
00613 #define EXP_OP_DIVIDE     0x04  
00614 #define EXP_OP_MOD        0x05

00616 #define EXP_OP_SUBTRACT   0x07  
00617 #define EXP_OP_AND        0x08  
00618 #define EXP_OP_OR         0x09

00620 #define EXP_OP_NOR        0x0b

00630 #define EXP_OP_NE         0x15  
00631 #define EXP_OP_CNE        0x16  
00632 #define EXP_OP_LOR        0x17  
00633 #define EXP_OP_LAND       0x18  
00634 #define EXP_OP_COND       0x19

00636 #define EXP_OP_UINV       0x1b

00644 #define EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL   0x23  
00645 #define EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL   0x24  
00646 #define EXP_OP_EXPAND     0x25  
00647 #define EXP_OP_CONCAT     0x26  
00648 #define EXP_OP_PEDGE      0x27  
00649 #define EXP_OP_NEDGE      0x28  
00650 #define EXP_OP_AEDGE      0x29  
00651 #define EXP_OP_LAST       0x2a  
00652 #define EXP_OP_EOR        0x2b  
00653 #define EXP_OP_DELAY      0x2c  
00654 #define EXP_OP_CASE       0x2d  
00655 #define EXP_OP_CASEX      0x2e  
00656 #define EXP_OP_CASEZ      0x2f  
00657 #define EXP_OP_DEFAULT    0x30  
00658 #define EXP_OP_LIST       0x31  
00659 #define EXP_OP_PARAM      0x32  
00660 #define EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT 0x33  
00661 #define EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT 0x34  
00668 #define EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x)      (((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_STATIC) && \
00669                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST) && \
00670                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LIST) && \
00671                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL) && \
00672                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASE) && \
00673                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEX) && \
00674                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEZ) && \
00675                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DEFAULT) && \
00676                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM) && \
00677                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT) && \
00678                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT) && \
00679                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY) && \
00680                                      !((SUPPL_IS_ROOT( x->suppl ) == 0) && \
00681                                        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SIG) || \
00682                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) || \
00683                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)) && \
00684                                        (SUPPL_OP( x->parent->expr->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND))) ? 1 : 0)
00685 
00690 #define EXPR_IS_STATIC(x)        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_STATIC)     || \
00691                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM)      || \
00692                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT) || \
00693                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT))
00694 
00699 #define EXPR_COMB_MISSED(x)        (EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE( x ) & \
00700                                     ~expression_is_static_only( x ) & \
00701                                     (~SUPPL_WAS_TRUE( x->suppl ) | ~SUPPL_WAS_FALSE( x->suppl )))

01166  Revision 1.67  2003/02/13 23:44:08  phase1geo
01167  Tentative fix for VCD file reading.  Not sure if it works correctly when
01168  original signal LSB is != 0.  Icarus Verilog testsuite passes.
01169 
01170  Revision 1.66  2003/02/12 14:56:22  phase1geo
01171  Adding info.c and info.h files to handle new general information line in
01172  CDD file.  Support for this new feature is not complete at this time.
01173 
01174  Revision 1.65  2003/02/07 23:12:30  phase1geo
01175  Optimizing db_add_statement function to avoid memory errors.  Adding check
01176  for -i option to avoid user error.
01177 
01178  Revision 1.64  2003/01/04 09:25:15  phase1geo
01179  Fixing file search algorithm to fix bug where unexpected module that was
01180  ignored cannot be found.  Added instance7.v diagnostic to verify appropriate
01181  handling of this problem.  Added tree.c and tree.h and removed define_t
01182  structure in lexer.
01183 
01184  Revision 1.63  2003/01/03 05:52:01  phase1geo
01185  Adding code to help safeguard from segmentation faults due to array overflow
01186  in VCD parser and symtable.  Reorganized code for symtable symbol lookup and
01187  value assignment.
01188 
01189  Revision 1.62  2002/12/07 17:46:52  phase1geo
01190  Fixing bug with handling memory declarations.  Added diagnostic to verify
01191  that memory declarations are handled properly.  Fixed bug with infinite
01192  looping in statement_connect function and optimized this part of the score
01193  command.  Added diagnostic to verify this fix (always9.v).  Fixed bug in
01194  report command with ordering of lines and combinational logic verbose output.
01195  This is now fixed correctly.
01196 
01197  Revision 1.61  2002/12/06 02:18:59  phase1geo
01198  Fixing bug with calculating list and concatenation lengths when MBIT_SEL
01199  expressions were included.  Also modified file parsing algorithm to be
01200  smarter when searching files for modules.  This change makes the parsing
01201  algorithm much more optimized and fixes the bug specified in our bug list.
01202  Added diagnostic to verify fix for first bug.
01203 
01204  Revision 1.60  2002/11/27 03:49:20  phase1geo
01205  Fixing bugs in score and report commands for regression.  Finally fixed
01206  static expression calculation to yield proper coverage results for constant
01207  expressions.  Updated regression suite and development documentation for
01208  changes.
01209 
01210  Revision 1.59  2002/11/24 14:38:12  phase1geo
01211  Updating more regression CDD files for bug fixes.  Fixing bugs where combinational
01212  expressions were counted more than once.  Adding new diagnostics to regression
01213  suite.
01214 
01215  Revision 1.58  2002/11/23 21:27:25  phase1geo

01221  bug with code underlining function in handling parameter in reports.  Fixing bugs
01222  with MBIT/SBIT handling (this is not verified to be completely correct yet).

01226  output in report command and updating full regression.
01227
